name: The Lost
detailed_description:
The game takes place in 2021. Running away from danger after an outbreak of a virus that infects people, you find yourself in an unknown area.
You have to defend, build a shelter, avoid danger, collect resources, hunt animals, create equipment for protection.

FEATURE

Nice graphics!

Dynamic change of weather!

Different types of weapons and weapons!

The body system! Watch your health, temperature, food, thirst, energy

Building! Build a shelter to protect

Craft! Create items, weapons, equipment

Open world! Explore the map

Resource mining! extract resources, each resource is important

Day-night-system!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470 / Radeon HD 5850 or Better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Better
  • Memory: 8 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7770 or Better
